definition: King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: The result indicated that the content of rhizoma polygonati polysaccharide is the highest by sonifier cell disrupter .
sentences.chinese: 结果表明超声波细胞粉碎仪提取的黄精多糖纯度最高。

sentences.english: To study the effect on the extract of rhizoma polygonati polysaccharide by sonifier cell disrupter .
sentences.chinese: 研究超声波细胞粉碎仪对黄精多糖提取的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To study the characteristics and immunological activities of the polysaccharides from Polygonatum sibiricum.
sentences.chinese: 研究遮阴对黄精光合特性和蒸腾速率的影响。

sentences.english: Objective: To compare the content of polysaccharide in Polygonatum sibiricum derived from different places.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较不同产地黄精中多糖的含量。

sentences.english: ObjectiveCarry out identifying a distinction to the Polygonatum sibiricum and Polygonatum odoratum collected from Mount Laoshan.
sentences.chinese: 目的对崂山采集到的黄精与玉竹进行鉴别。

definition: morinda root (Morinda officinalis), plant used in Chinese medicine
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
Epimedium, genus of herbaceous flowering plant, cultivated in the Far East as aphrodisiac/also called barrenwort or horny goatweed (said to resemble crushed goat's testicles)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
golden eye-grass (Curculigo orchioides)/Curculigo rhizome (used in TCM)
dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
